Class StateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hexensemble.mildred.states.StateManager

  • public class StateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads assets and manages the application states.

    Alpha 1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
